snippet.title: Kingsblood - Release Trailer - Coming June 21st
snippet.description:
Kingsblood: In this tactical RPG you assemble followers to face the crown's injustice. You guide them through dangerous missions and dungeons as the story unfolds. Unlock their true potential by skillful party assembly and combat decisions. Can you make it to the final chapter? 

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1515020/Kingsblood/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/KingsbloodGame
Reddit: https://reddit.com/r/kingsblood/
Discord: https://discord.gg/XBhv7ZT

#tactical #rpg #indiegame
